short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Paste text snippets from the toolbar, context menu or keyboard shortcuts

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
⭐ Quickly paste text snippets in your browser⭐

Open the extension options to set up to 16 text snippets and toggle any of three handy ways to paste: 

- Click the 'Paste It' toolbar button.
- Use a keyboard shortcut (Alt+V by default, fully configurable)
- Right-click to paste from the context menu.

Paste It is safe, secure and free to use with no ads or tracking.
